entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times early this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
